column2: GM sees auto industry slowing in turbulent Middle East DUBAI
column3: Sept 1 General Motors said it expected the automobile industry in the Middle East to show growth that is sustainable
column4: but at a slower rate than in the last few years
column5: hurt by uncertainty and political crisis in markets such as Egypt and Syria.
